snippet: Next year’s quota for Bluefin tuna off the United States, Canada and Mexico was raised by 14 percent to 2,000 metric tons by the International Commission for the Conservation of Atlantic Tunas.
abstract: International Commission for the Conservation of Atlantic Tunas raises 2015 quota for Bluefin tuna off the United States, Canada and Mexico by 14 percent, to 2,000 metric tons.
lead_paragraph: Next year’s quota for Bluefin tuna off the United States, Canada and Mexico was raised by 14 percent to 2,000 metric tons by the International Commission for the Conservation of Atlantic Tunas.

headline.main: Commission Raises Quota for Bluefin Tuna in Atlantic
headline.print_headline: Commission Raises Quota for Bluefin Tuna in Atlantic

keywords.value: International Commission for the Conservation of Atlantic Tunas
